text.section: The employer or its insurer shall provide the medical services and treatment required under subsection (a) of this section for the period required by the nature of the accidental personal injury, compensable hernia, or occupational disease.

Except as provided in § 9-736(b) and (c) of this title, any award or order of the Commission under this section may not be construed to:
reopen any case; or
allow any previous award to be changed.
